meanings.definition: Engaged in a physical struggle or fight
meanings.sent1: The two wrestlers were evenly matched in their strength.
meanings.sent2: The wrestler showed impressive skills during the match.
meanings.sent3: The wrestler's determination was as strong as his muscles.
meanings.sent4: Her mind and body wrestled with the decision all night.
meanings.sent5: The image of the wrestlers grappling will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Contended or struggled with a difficult situation or problem
meanings.sent1: She wrestled with her fear before finally facing it.
meanings.sent2: He wrestled with the math problem until he found the solution.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a cat wearing a hat wrestled with her serious thoughts.
meanings.sent4: His conscience wrestled with the decision to tell the truth.
meanings.sent5: The company wrestled with financial difficulties before turning things around.
